item.description:
Let's come together for a cocktail of invigorating music and calming meditation clubbed into an intoxicating blend that will recharge you from inside out.


The internationally renowned Bhakti band from NYC(www.bhaktiband.com) is here to take you on a journey into kirtan music sung primarily in Sanskrit, an ancient language known for its healing vibrations. Bhakti Band musicians fuse their diverse backgrounds in rock, soul, world and jazz music with their love for meditation and yoga to bring expression to this beautiful form of meditative singing.

 

Bhakti has played everywhere from New York’s Town Hall and Lincoln Center to the United Nations and Jakkur Airfield in Bangalore, India in front of a crowd of millions. All band members actively volunteer on community service projects and use their music to help harmonize, heal and uplift the people around them.

 

So, join us for an evening of amazing music & hang around later to connect with like minded people over organic juices and hors d'oeuvres. Tickets are limited, get yours today at http://soundplussilence.eventbrite.com.

 

You can find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/events/489026054467354/.
item.name: Sound + Silence: Music & Meditation Mixer
